content: Thank you for providing even more details on how to craft effective prompts. I appreciate the examples and the focus on artistic mediums, specificity, time periods, emotions, colors, and environments. These examples will be valuable in helping me create better prompts for generating images. I'm eager to apply these principles and techniques to offer you more creative and accurate ideas. If you have any additional guidance or are ready for me to provide new ideas based on these prompting techniques, please let me know.
